153.content:
A short distance from the Belview Mansion, situated just on the edge of a dark, foreboding forest, were two small wooden Cabins. Refurbished several years ago by a wealthy family who had staked a claim to the land, the cabins had remained relatively unused. They were isolated, out of the way and easy to miss, so had been left untouched and unappreciated for some time. Until, that is, a group of friends decided to take a weekend break...

Driving up the dirt road to the site of the cabins was an averaged sized van with six five people inside.

In the driver's seat sat Zac. Dark haired, with a chiselled, handsome face and a fit, muscular body. Zac was a naturally generous, outgoing sort of guy, and always volunteered to be the designated driver. Zac worked as a personal trainer at his local Gym, and took his fitness regime very seriously. He wore a pair of jeans and a tight muscle tee which showed off his physique.

Beside Zac sat his girlfriend, Tiffany. Tiffany had short, red hair and was wearing a green tank top and denim shorts which hugged her curves in just the right places. She had an impressive bust, and Zac kept stealing looks at her cleavage as he drove. Tiffany was utterly besotted with Zac, since the two started dating a few months ago, and stared at him adoringly as he drove. She was a little ditzy, but loved to have a good time, and was constantly in a good mood, always seeing the positive side of any situation.

Behind them sat their friends, Mark and Debbie. Mark was a lot more slender than Zac, but still in good shape. He had dark, well styled hair which drew attention to his pale skin and dark eyes. He was wearing jeans and a black t shirt, and was holding a map, trying to give Zac directions. Mark had a sarcastic, cynical sense of humour, but could always be relied upon in a crisis.

Sitting next to Mark was Debbie, who was currently reading a book she had packed. Debbie had short brown hair and wore a loose, knitted sweater and jeans. A pair of round glasses sat on her pretty face, and she kept brushing a strand of hair out of her view. Though she had never admitted it, she had quite a crush on Mark. She was quite bookish and geeky, and usually could be found reading a book rather than out partying like the others.

In the back seat sat, currently asleep, was Taylor. Taylor's hair was dyed purple, and she had a punk like style, with a lip and nose piercing, tattoos and dark lipstick. She wore a striped tank top and a tight, leather skirt. She was quite a daredevil, usually found encouraging others to get into all sorts of trouble and always ready to try new things.

"Okay, I think we're finally here!" Zac announced.

"I knew you'd find it babe," Tiffany said with a smile.

"We would've found it much sooner if you'd listened to my dam directions," Mark said, lowering the map and glowering into the rear view mirror. "We nearly went off a cliff."

"That wasn't a cliff, Mark, just a...small hill..." Zac said.

Mark exchanged a look with Debbie, who laughed.

"Taylor, time to wake up, we're here," Debbie said, reaching around to give Taylor a prod.

"Huh? Oh...right...the cabin..." Taylor groaned as she awoke, rubbing her eyes and yawning nosily. "Cool, we made it here alive. Never doubted you, Zac."

The car pulled up outside one of the two cabins, which were reasonably close together and probably about a five minute walk apart. They were nestled just on the edge of the forest, with the trees looming behind them, and a fine layer of fog starting to creep in as night settled. The group jumped out of the car, happy to stretch their legs.

"Okay, me and Tiff will take the one on the right," Zac said, before remembering something. "Oh wait, ours has three beds and the other has two...but ours has the jacuzzi...didn't you want that one babe?"

Tiffany nodded eagerly. "Only reason I came."

"It's fine, I'll take the spare room," Taylor shrugged. "Keep it down though...you two can be...noisy..."

Zac and Tiffany exchanged a knowing look and smiled at each other.

"Guess we'll take the other one," Mark shrugged. "You happy with that Deb?"

"Oh, sure, no problem," Debbie smiled, trying not to hide her contentment at the arrangements.

Mark grabbed his and Debbie's stuff and headed off, with her trailing behind him. She waved goodbye to the others and hurried to catch him up. Zac grabbed everyone's stuff effortlessly and carried it off to the cabin in his muscular arms...

"Hey, what's this?" Mark called, pointing to the wooden flooring.

"What is it?" Deb asked, peering at the spot on the floor and noticing a hatch. "Oh, we have basement? Since when do cabins have basements?"

"Maybe it's for storage or something?" Mark suggested. "Weird though. Shall we take a look?"

Before Deb could answer, Mark pulled the hatch open and climbed down. Deb wasn't exactly keen to go down into a dank, dark basement where she couldn't see, but decided to follow him down anyway. Stepping down a rickety ladder, she missed the last step and dropped the rest of the way. Fortunately, Mark caught her before she fell flat on her face. "Thanks," she said, adjusting her round glasses with a smile.

"No worries," Mark said, gently brushing her arms as she steadied herself.

He moved to flick a light switch on and the basement area lit up, revealing a work bench, chest of drawers and a bookcase. Examining their surroundings, the pair checked out the four corners of the room. Mark batted a spider away from his head awkwardly, apparently not a fan of bugs. Deb blew the dust off a book on the shelf, which was a very old, thick looking tome. She flicked through some of the pages, which were written in a language she couldn't make out. The other books looked to be trashy romance novels, some Harry Potter books and a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 1994 annual. Quality reading material, obviously.

Mark was looking at an antique mirror, in which he was adjusting his hair. He didn't really see much of value around here, but it had been worth checking it out just so he could catch Debbie when she tripped on the step. She was so cute when she was looking worried. He'd often wondered whether to ask her out, but she never really seemed that into him.

"I think that's everything," Mark shrugged, taking one last look around. "I'm going to hold on to this mirror."

"I'm going to check this book out," Deb said, holding up the ancient looking volume. "I'm interested to see what language it is."

They went back up stairs, closing the hatch behind them. It was getting late at this point, and the journey had tired them out, so they said good night and went off to bed...

When she was back in her room, Debbie sat on the bed, cross legged, and opened up the book. She felt a sense of disappointment that Mark hadn't asked her to stay up and do something fun, but she guessed he had just been tired. Maybe she was getting her hopes up. She sighed and looked down at the book; at least she could satisfy her curiosity and get some reading done in the tranquil forest environment. It was pretty peaceful up here, and she wondered whether to find a nice quiet spot in the morning where she could catch up on her books.

For now though, she was interested in that weird old book she'd picked out of the basement. She looked down at the fad ed, crumpled pages and started flicking through; the words were in a foreign language, but not one she recognised. There were, however, some odd pictures scattered throughout the book of men and women; some short, some tall, some fat, some thin...every different type of body really. She carried on flicking and came to an image on the inside of the back cover of a beautiful, winged woman with small horns. Underneath the image was the word "Zellera". Subconsciously, Debbie read the word out-loud.

Almost immediately, Debbie noticed a strange, purple smoke coming from the floorboards. With a shriek, she jumped off the bed and went for the door, but found herself turning back as the smoke engulfed her vision. She coughed and spluttered, fanning the air with her hands, fearing the entire place had been set on fire somehow. Then, as soon as it had appeared, the smoke began to melt away and form into a human like shape. Debbie gasped as the smoke formed into a feminine, human silhouette and a woman stepped out, the same woman she had seen in the drawing.

The woman in front of her had long, red hair that reached all the way down to her butt. She wore a red corset and knee high boots, and had a long, forked tail. The corset accentuated her curves, bubble butt and impressive cleavage. She was wearing a dark red lipstick which drew attention to her pale, milky skin. Smiling as she took a step forward, she looked Debbie up and down. "Thank you, mortal, for freeing me. I thought nobody would ever find that book." She stretched out, her wings extending across the room. Her cracked her neck and extended her arms like she had just woken up from a long nap.

Debbie couldn't believe what she was seeing. She kept fiddling with the door knob, trying desperately to escape, but she couldn't seem to get a grip on it. As she continued to struggle, she felt something wrap around her waist, and looked down to see the girl's forked tail snaking around her middle. She let out a little yelp and found herself being pulled back.

"No need to be scared," the winged girl said softly. She pulled Debbie to within an inch of her face and smiled at her. "My name is Zellera, but you know that, you read my name from the book."

"I...I..." Debbie tried to find the words, but could not. She was terrified.

"It's okay, I'm a succubus," Zellera said, her hand brushing Deb's cheek.

That didn't make Debbie feel any better. She knew full well what a succubus was. "Please, don't hurt me."

Pulling open the fridge, which she had expected to be empty, Taylor was met by a couple of plates, both stacked with various treats. She could see cookies, brownies, doughnuts... All delicious looking, and probably very heavy on calories. And yet, compared to her simple ham and cheese sandwich...

A cookie or two wouldn't go amiss, would it? Taylor thought, grabbing a couple of cookies from the plate nearest her...
15333.title: Stocked Fridge?

choices: Taylor goes back for another helping as Zac and Tiffany walk in...
Taylor finds the fridge mysteriously empty, and her stomach rumbling...
Taylor falls asleep, and has a strange dream...
153331.content:
"No reason I can't have both," Taylor shrugged.

She grabbed a bunch of the cookies and dumped them onto a plate with the sandwich. Crossing the room to the couch, she took a bite of her sandwich, which, while decent, was far less appealing than those soft, chocolatey cookies. None the less, she finished the sandwich off in a few bites. She was about to reach for a cookie when she heard a moan from Tiffany and some splashing around. Hope they clean that tub after their finished...she thought.

With the sandwich gone, she eagerly reached for the cookies and bit into the first one. They were amazing! Perfectly chewy and soft. She didn't know who had stocked this place up, but they were clearly an amazing chef. Her hand reached for another cookie, and another, and she continued popping them into her mouth as she sat and looked at her phone. The signal out here wasn't great, so an attempt to load her Instagram failed. "Ugh, hate being without technology," she grumbled.

She was beginning to regret coming along for this trip. While Mark and Deb would probably hook up and Zac and Tiff would spend the whole weekend fucking, she was pretty much a spare part. She felt disconnected from the world and wasn't really sure how she was going to pass the time. She had slept plenty in the car, and wasn't feeling at all tired. With her mind elsewhere, she looked down to see that the plate of cookies were now a plate of crumbs. Surprised, she got back up and returned to the fridge, loading up her plate with more snacks; half a dozen brownies, two doughnuts and another handful of cookies. She told herself she wouldn't eat them all in one go, but when she got back to the couch, that was easier said than done.

"Man these are good..." Taylor said in between bites, crumbs spilling down her top as she greedily munched her way through the brownies. "Well, if nothing else, at least I can enjoy the food up here."

Gobbling up everything on her plate with increasing speed, Taylor soon found herself reaching for a pile of crumbs again. "Jeez...gone already? Dam, these are moreish. Think I'll get more. Heh..."

Another trip to the fridge and another plate full followed, with Taylor settling comfortably onto the sofa with a larger portion, chomping her way through the delicious snacks. Her stomach was slowly beginning to bloat, pushing out against her tight leather skirt. When she had finished her third helping, she was starting to feel a little full, and noticed the prominent bulge beneath her top. "Oops, guess I overdid it on the snacks," she laughed, patting her full tummy. "Bit of a food baby there, Tay."
153331.title: Cookie Binge

choices: Taylor's body guides her towards the fridge...
Taylor returns to her room, intending to sleep...
Mark and Debbie appear, wanting to explore...
1533311.content:
Cradling her bulging belly, Taylor spent a few moments playfully poking it in various places. Giving her belly a final squeeze, her belly grumbled lightly.

"But you're so full!" Taylor told her, earning another gurgle in response. "Well, play then... You've convinced me! A fourth plate won't hurt!"

Getting to her feet with a sigh, Taylor grabbed her plate and returned to the fridge. Despite having greedily gobbled down three full plates, the two platters in the fridge still seemed as full as ever. In fact, it looked as though she hadn't even touched them.

Weird... Taylor thought as she began to stock up her fourth plate. But whatevs. Treats are good...

As she scooped a couple of brownies onto her plate, she heard a door behind her swing open, followed by a few giggles.

"Stop it, Zac!"

"Or what?"

"Hmmm... I think I'll have to punish you!"

"Oh? In that case..."

Hearing the sound of flesh being slapped, followed by an excited squeal from Tiffany, Taylor rolled her eyes in disgust.

Not like I'm right here or anything... She thought, topping off her pyramid of treats with a jelly doughnut. Whatever, I've got my treats to keep me company!

Stuffing a whole custard doughnut into her mouth, she closed the door with her hip and began to make her way back to the sofa. As she passed by the hallway, the door on the left creaked open, Zac and Tiffany practically falling through it in one anothers arms. Falling up against the wall, Taylor watched them whisper into each others ears for a moment before, with an amused cough, she made her presence known to the two lovers.

"O-Oh! Taylor! I didn't see you... there?"

Tiffany broke away from Zac, the bright smile on her face morphing into a slightly more confused one as she caught sight of the massive pyramid of food Taylor held.

"Where'd you get all that?" Zac asked, cocking a curious eyebrow. "Pretty sure we didn't pack that many sweets".

"This? There's plates full of the stuff in the fridge," Taylor answered, lifting a cookie and devouring it hungrily in two bites. "Dunno how it got there, but they're super tasty!"

"I... can see that," Tiffany noted, her eyes glued to Taylor's swollen gut. "Maybe you should cut back on them? And stop eating them? I mean, who just eats food they find in a cabin in the middle of nowhere?"

Taylor didn't answer immediately, her mouth stuffed full with a jelly doughnut. Swallowing, she grinned back at the duo.

"Nothing wrong with them! Unless being too tasty is a crime!"

Turning away from her friends, Taylor rammed a brownie into her mouth, crumbs raining down between her breasts, and returned to the sofa. Planting her rear end back on the sofa, she quickly lost track of time as she gobbled her way down the pyramid. With each bit of food swallowed, her belly pushed outwards a little more, her tank-top gradually sliding up and revealing more and more of her belly...

"Aw, man... Those are good..."

Pushing the final eclair into her mouth, Taylor let out an exhausted groan. Stoking her belly, a quiet burp escaped her body. While she would've happily returned for a fifth plate, her belly was stuffed to capacity. Any more, and she might burst.

"Urgh... So full..."

Grunting as she pushed her full body to its feet, Taylor rested a hand on her lower back. With the amount she had eaten, her food baby had reached the latter half of its second trimester. Her walk having devolved into a waddle, Taylor started for the hallway, intending to rest off her meal. Zac and Tiffany watched her go, concern on their faces...
1533311.title: Taylor's Treats

choices: She wakes up at midnight, and decides she needs a snack...
She hears a noise, and finds Zac and Tiffany stuffing themselves in the kitchen.
As she sleeps, Taylor's body begins to soften up...
15333112.content:
Ignoring the temptation to head straight back to the fridge for an extra few doughnuts, Taylor headed back to her room. The rather judgemental looks she had gotten from Zac and Tiff had shamed her into not eating anymore tonight, though, oddly, she felt that she could easily have scarfed down a couple of extra brownies. She had become increasingly annoyed at how judgemental those two fitness freaks had been since they got together; constantly talking about how fit they were, how much time they spent at the gym, how hard their abs were...ugh...it was tiresome. How dare they make fun of her just for eating a few extra snacks?

Pouting, Taylor unzipped her skirt, breathing a sigh of relief as her stomach bulged forward, free of it's leather prison. She shuffled the skirt down her legs and kicked it away, kicking off her shoes and socks and sitting down on the edge of her bed. Her hand immediately went to her bloated tummy, massaging it in small circles. She hadn't noticed before, but her tank top had ridden up, embarrassingly, over her belly button, which might have explained why Zac and Tiff had looked so concerned. But oh well, they'd seen a belly button before.

Taylor pulled her top up even further, exposing the entirety of her very full, very round, looking belly, and gave it a pat. "Maybe they were right actually...I look pregnant...feeling kinda tired though."

Not bothering to change into her pyjamas, Taylor lay down and let her head sink into her surprisingly comfortable pillow. The whole bed seemed incredibly comfortable actually, and surprisingly roomy for a single. She shifted a few times, trying to gain a more comfortable position, which was made difficult by her gurgling, stuffed belly. She finally settled on her side, hand resting atop her stomach as she drifted off to sleep...
15333112.title: Sleeping it off...sort of

choices: Taylor awakens the next day, hungry yet full of energy...
Taylor is woken by Tiffany, who immediately notices her softer frame...
Taylor sleepwalks back to the fridge...
153331123.content:
As Taylor slept, the hand that had rested atop her stuffed stomach remained there. Rolling over onto her other side, a cute noise escaping her mouth as she did so, her hand fell away, only to be replaced by her other one. Unlike the first, this one was a tad more active, slowly tracing circles around her indented belly button. As it did so, her belly gurgled and groaned quietly...

Slowly yet steadily, her gut lost its solid shape, taking on a much softer and more malleable one. As Taylor rolled onto her back, both hands coming up to rest atop it, her belly bulged outwards, sagging down over the waistband of her panties. As it did so, the rest of her trim body seemed to thicken.

Her breasts, nowhere near the size of Tiffany's yet still larger than Deb's, grew slightly, gaining maybe a cup size and making both her bra and tank-top for around them a little more snugly. Lower down on her body, her black panties stretched as her hips gained a layer of pudge that bulged over their waistband. Her ample ass swelled slightly, her panties slipping a little between the soft cheeks, while her thighs pushed closer to one another, stopping with about an inch of space between them.

And, as quickly as it had started, Taylor's growth came to an end. Her hands, which had been rather rigid atop her belly during the whole ordeal, fell limp before falling to either side of her body. A yawn escaped Taylor's mouth as she seemed to sink further into her mattress, a content smile on her face as she dreamed of that fridge and its delicious contents...
153331123.title: Tubby Taylor

choices: At the barbeque, Taylor overindulges herself...
At the barbeque, Taylor notices that her friends seem a little different...
Taylor enjoys the barbeque without incident...
1533311232.content:
"Hey..."

Taylor, fast asleep, let out a mumble as a hand rested on her shoulder, shaking her gently. The small pouch of belly fat that hung over her waistband wobbled from side to side, which seemed to disgust whoever was trying to wake her.

"Urgh, you've really let yourself go. I mean, look at this belly!"

A groan escaped Taylor, followed by a feeble slap on the hand poking her soft gut.

"Even your breasts and backside are bigger! What have you been eating, girl?!"

As a hand rudely cupped one of her breasts, Taylor finally awoke. Eyes fluttering open, she glanced down at her body, brow furrowing as she found a hand that wasn't her own inspecting her right breast.

"What the hell?!"

Letting out a yell, Taylor rolled away from the hand, stopping to face her groper. Meanwhile, they let out their own yell, however theirs was slightly more surprised than angry.

"What the hell, Tif?!" Taylor demanded furiously, protectively crossing her arms over her plush chest. "What kinda wake-up was that?! I dont know how you and Zac do it, but you can't just walk into somebody's room and start touching them!"

"Sorry, sorry..." Tiffany bowed in apology. "But I couldn't help it! You're getting a little... soft..."

At this, Taylor blushed a furious red.

"I...I...I'm what?!"

"Just look at your belly, Taylor! You've put on a little weight recently! But not to worry, Zac and I can help you work it off!"

"Tif?" Taylor asked sweetly. "Get outta my room. And come back when you learn some manners".

Tiffany was still for a moment before nodding. Getting to her feet, she headed for the door.

"If you want our help..."

"GET OUT!"

Tiffany let out a squeak before slipping out, the door closing behind her. Taylor, breathing heavily, stared at it for a few moments, trying to calm herself down.

God, she's so dense! Taylor thought. You can't wake somebody up by groping their tits, then call them fat! Like, come on, Tif, we aren't all fitness freaks who live in a gym with our hot boyfriend! Though, as much as I hate to admit it... She wasn't wrong...

Grabbing her belly with both hands, Taylor gave it a light shake. Its surface rippled slightly, the underside bouncing lightly against her panties. Letting go of her new pudge, Taylor then turned her attention to the rest of her thickened frame. Before she could properly inspect it, however, there was a knock at her door.

"Hey, Taylor?"

Glancing up, her eyes narrowed dangerously.

"Zac, I swear to God, if you comment on my weight..."

"Your weight? Nah, not at all. You watch it well, why would I comment on it? We're about to start the barbeque. You in?"

"Oh... Oh, yeah. Just give me a few to get changed!"

Hearing Mark disappear down the hall, Taylor bounced out of bed. Ignoring her belly, which bounced with her, she scooped up her shirt and began to pull it up her legs. It went up fine, until she reached her backside. Designed to cling tightly to her body, it didn't agree with her plumper backside, quickly getting stuck beneath her cheeks. After a brief struggle, Taylor managed to yank it over her backside. Unfortunately, due its tightness, a band of flesh bulged over its waistband. Tugging her tank-top down as best she could, Taylor left her room and went to join her friends outside...
1533311232.title: A Rude Awakening

choices: Taylor out eats everyone there...
Taylor notices everyone else is eating a lot as well...
Taylor has a wardrobe malfunction...
15333112321.content:
Taylor left the cabin and headed towards the clearing where the others were sat. Mark and Debbie were sat in two folding chairs, chatting, while Zac was standing shirtless in front of the BBQ, loading it up with burgers. Tiffany, wearing an extremely tight pair of denim shorts and her bikini top, clung to his arm, her other hand brushing against his six pack. Taylor rolled her eyes, though she couldn't deny he looked good.

Zac had a whole cooler full of burgers and hot dogs he was tossing on the grill, way too much for the five of them, but maybe he was planning on bulking up again. He always ate a lot of food when he was trying to pack on muscle. Taylor took a seat beside Mark and Deb.

"Sleep okay?" Mark asked.

"Yeah, pretty good," Taylor said. "Hey, did you guys have a fridge full of goodies, too?"

Mark and Deb exchanged a confused look and shook their heads.

"Huh, just ours then," Taylor shrugged, feeling her bulging tummy push against her skirt. She wondered if Mark and Deb had noticed too, but neither seemed to be staring at her the way Tiff had, so that was a plus.

Zac soon served up the burgers, and Taylor eagerly went for one. Despite her binge last night, she was feeling like she could easily eat some more. There seemed to be a huge pile of meat, so Taylor loaded up her plate with two burgers and two hot dogs. Even that seemed to draw a judgemental look from Tiff, who glanced knowingly down at her choices. Taylor ignored that and took a huge bite there and then, happily munching away as she returned to her chair...
15333112321.title: BBQ Belly

choices: Tif notices a third tear in Taylor's skirt...
As Taylor enters the kitchen, her belly gurgles hungrily...
Taylor changes clothes before rejoining her friends...
153331123213.content:
Planting her softer backside into her chosen seat, Taylor continued to ignore Tiffany, who was not so subtly whispering to Zac and casting the occasional glance her way. Steadily making her through her plate of meat, it didn't take her long to finish both burgers and hotdogs. Letting out a satisfied sigh, she got back to her feet and returned to the grill.

"I mean, just look at it, Zac!" She heard Tif whine quietly.

"Give it a rest, babe!" Zac retorted. "If she wants to eat, let her eat. The whole point of this getaway is to relax. For all you know, she eats while she relaxes".

"But... She's eating too much... That belly..."

"Not your business. And besides, I've got an idea of how we can relax later..."

The lovebirds trailed off into hushed whispers, an occasional giggle from Tiffany mixed in. Grateful for Zac's interference, Taylor stocked up again, piling three burgers and two hotdogs onto her plate this time. As she returned to her seat, she overheard Mark and Deb's conversation.

"I dunno, I think we should tell them..." Deb muttered. "Maybe they can help us explore it!"

"The only things those two are exploring are each other," Mark replied with a smirk. "And Taylor... Well, it's right up her alley. She loves exploring weird places. But... Would she even fit down the hatch?"

"Mark!" Debbie gave him a gentle slap, bringing a slight grin to Taylor's face. "You can't just say stuff like that!"

Well, at least a couple of people have my back, Taylor thought, polishing off her final hotdog. Wow, done already... And still hungry. Wonder what Tif's gonna say when I go up for thirds?

Bouncing to her feet, Taylor was about to return to the grill when she heard a sudden creak from her skirt, followed by the sensation of a light breeze across her hips. Glancing down at her sides, her face flushed warmly as she caught sight of two tears in her skirt, one on either side. Thankfully, the garment was still in one piece, but barely.

Oh, God... Taylor thought, setting her plate on her seat and poking her swollen hips. If Tif sees this, she'll force me on a diet. Don't particularly want that, not after last time I agreed to one of her exercise plans...

"I'm heading to the toilet," Taylor announced, hands on her hips. "Back in a moment!"

Receiving no answer, Taylor turned towards her cabin...
153331123213.title: Torn Leather

choices: Taylor, despite her best efforts, goes back for more BBQ food...
Taylor goes exploring with Mark and Deb...
Much to her surprise, Taylor finds Tiffany pigging out at the grill...
1533311232131.content:
Keeping her hands firmly glued to her hips, Taylor hurried back towards the bathroom at the cabin. In her current situation, and with her weird, staggered little jog, it seemed to take an eternity to get to the door. Just as she was about to take her hand off her side and pull the door open, she heard an audible Rrrrrrrrrip! from below. "Ah crap, that better not have been what I think..." Taylor grumbled, casting a glance over her shoulder to make sure nobody had seen, or heard, the sudden tearing. Fortunately, the others were all busy crowding around the BBQ, all apart from Tiffany, who was, Taylor now realised, standing to her right.

"Tif..." Taylor greeted awkwardly.

"Tay," the redhead replied, hands on her hips.

"Just on my way to the bathroom," Taylor said, gently pushing on the door. Oh God, where did that rip come from? Has she noticed the skirt? Just my luck...

"Tay, you're skirt just ripped right down the middle, I can see your panties," Tiffany said, shaking her head judgementally.

"It...it what?!" Taylor went red and felt the back seat of her skirt, her fingers slipping inside a large tear right down the middle of her butt. "Ah, fuck."

"Tay, I know you think I'm getting at you, but I'm only trying to help," Tiffany said. "This isn't normal. You shouldn't be literally eating yourself out of your clothes, it's not healthy, and it's kind of embarassing."

"Yep, really feeling the embarrassment angle, thanks Tif," Taylor said, hand pressed firmly to the open gap in her skirt.

"Look, I'm sorry if was rude to you before, but you know I'm only looking out for you, right? If you want I can help you diet, remember the last time, you got those awesome abs!" Tiff said, excitedly.

While Taylor appreciated the peace offering and the apology, she couldn't stand to try another of Tiffany's crazy-ass diets. "That's really nice of you, Tif...I'll uh...think about it, after I change into something more comfortable." With that, Taylor ducked inside the cabin and hurried to her room. With an immense sigh of relief, she let go of her skirt and turned to face her reflection in the mirror; Tiffany hadn't been wrong, she could gotten bigger, but had barely even noticed it happening.

Why didn't she say anything before today? Not like her to miss when someone puts on a few pounds.

Taylor unzipped her skirt at the side and let her tummy bulge free. With a groan of relief, she sat down on the edge of her bed and let her bloated stomach bulge over the top of her skirt, forming a chunky roll of flab that she could have sworn had only just appeared. Prodding it gently, she was surprised by how soft her stomach had grown. With a sigh, she pulled her skirt down over her thighs, squeezing it pass her wider legs and kicking it away. It was useless now, which was really a shame, considering it had been her favourite one.

Stupid belly, Taylor thought, poking at her newfound flab. Not my fault my metabolism sucks.

Taylor rose from the bed and picked something new from the clothes she had packed; a pair of jeans which had been a size too big when she bought them. She usually wore them with a belt, but as she slipped them up over her legs and past her thighs, she realised that wasn't going to be necessary this time. Buttoning them up, she found her stomach had much more room to breathe, and wondered whether the skirt had shrunk or something? Maybe that was the problem after all?

She left her room and walked back outside, following her nose back to the BBQ...
1533311232131.title: Seat of the pants gaining
